title: inspace
author: inspace
content: As indicated in the header, I am looking for a trusted site where I can choose the best exchange rates and the best exchanger for myself.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:15:03 PMAs indicated in the header, I am looking for a trusted site where I can choose the best exchange rates and the best exchanger for myself.BestChange is a pioneer in its field, and it is almost unrivaled in terms of efficiency by virtue of its continuous activity for 16 years in the field of technology to develop with the advancement of blockchain technology and specialize in providing the safest options for those looking for cryptocurrency trading platforms.  There are certainly sites that list trading platforms in the market according to several settings, but they are always insufficient compared to the conditions that BestChange imposes on its customers.  There are also sites that list trading platforms according to user reviews, but they are also not as efficient, as those ratings can be manipulated.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I never heard any similar one to BestChange that's the only current well-known and trusted one.Would you mind telling us why looking for alternatives?Anyway, check this one below I use some of their exchange partners before that supported crypto and they do also have trust scores the only problem is the exchange that I used before ended closing their business(I like their cheap rates). Code:https://perfectmoney.com/business-partners.html

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Alternatively, you could tell us what you're looking for in an exchange and perhaps we could list some of them for you?Back to your question: I don't know anything similar right now but for instant exchanges, I know OmegaStarScream is planning to create something similar so keep an eye on their Instant Exchanges thread, see: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5218464.0Quote from: OmegaStarScream on May 30, 2023, 10:47:33 AMIt's not going to be an aggregator. I was actually thinking of maybe a combination of both sites so basically:- Rates- Open source or not - Monero support- Supported networks/chains and coins (with the ability to filter) - LN support- link to Trustpilot reviews + the ability to review the exchange on the site as welletc.Your thoughts? Or do you still think it's a bit pointless?You could try to suggest a feature you wanna see as well. Who knows, they may consider it.

Or maybe I didn't manage to find the EN (or any other) version of the siteSome example:https://exchangesumo.com/ (RU only)https://e-mon.ru/  (RU only)https://glazok.org/  (RU only)https://rates.guru/  (a good part of the site is in ENG, although it is obviously aimed at the needs of the Russian market)https://www.okchanger.com/  (EN)note: This is not my direct recommendation for using these services, it is just a simple list of similar monitoring services.Quote from: BitMaxz on June 14, 2023, 03:04:36 PMBestChange that's the only current well-known and trusted one.I would agree with this statement here, however, Best_Change has gained a positive reputation (at least on this forum), so I have seen no reason to take risks with other services.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: OP, you could use an exchange that is decentralized and doesn't require KYC. Some instant exchanges could freeze your coins and ask you to undergo KYC. I recently bookmarked https://www.athena-alpha.com/exchanges/ as a good source that has many non-KYC exchange services. Quote from: examplens on June 14, 2023, 03:56:04 PM<Snip> Luckily, it's easy to automatically translate the Russian Cyrillic alphabet to English using Google Chrome for those who don't understand it. For some reason, many instant exchanges operate out of Russia. Probably because it's the second biggest market after the US.

comments.author: Synchronice
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:15:03 PMAs indicated in the header, I am looking for a trusted site where I can choose the best exchange rates and the best exchanger for myself.There aren't BestChange alternatives. If I were you, I would use them because they are active on this forum and if anything, you can open scam accusation thread here and chances that your problem will be resolved is very high but to be completely honest, they have been running this service for years without problems.Btw if you are looking for recommendations, FixedFloat usually has good rates, is instant and automatic. Can say the same on Easybit but sometimes they have bad rates, sometimes - good. But I prefer FF over others.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: From your post history, it sounds like you're trying to build a website similar to BestChange, hence why you're looking for similar websites for your market research. If this is indeed your purpose, I suggest you make a new thread where you ask people what kind of feature they'd like to see from an aggregator website. I do believe it is more efficient compared to doing your own research, it also reduces the bias from your POV  to some extent IMO.Your review campaign is also nice, but there is no harm to share your current product so that others can review it freely. Some people do provide feedback even if you don't pay them.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: I think trocador.app is a great alternative if you want to find best rates for cryptocurrency exchanges that work without kyc verification.Trocador.app is showing rate, spread, kyc rating (A, B, C, D), they are offering insurance, and you can pick between fixed and floating rate.Down side is that you can't find any fiat payment option, they have limited number of partners, and you have to trust them for rating system.
